description: A high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

vulnerabilities.title: [CVE-2014-1830]  Information Exposure
vulnerabilities.description: Requests (aka python-requests) before 2.3.0 allows remote servers to obtain sensitive information by reading the Proxy-Authorization header in a redirected request.

vulnerabilities.title: [CVE-2014-1829]  Information Exposure
vulnerabilities.description: Requests (aka python-requests) before 2.3.0 allows remote servers to obtain a netrc password by reading the Authorization header in a redirected request.

description: YAML parser and emitter for Python

vulnerabilities.title: [CVE-2017-18342]  Improper Input Validation
vulnerabilities.description: In PyYAML before 4.1, the yaml.load() API could execute arbitrary code. In other words, yaml.safe_load is not used.
